Title: Frankenstein Unlimited
Director: King-Wei Chu, Matthew Forbes, Martin Gauthier, Peter James, Maude Michaud, Matthew Saliba
Writer: King-Wei Chu (segment), Matthew Forbes (segment), Martin Gauthier (segment), Peter James (segment), Maude Michaud (segment), Alex Sabbagh (segment), Matthew Saliba (segment)
Actors: Kayden Rose, Martin Plouffe, John M. Thomas, Christophe Cecconi
Plot: A feature-length anthology project composed of six independently produced short films by young Montreal filmmakers all using the themes of the original Frankenstein novel as inspiration.
